text: The Sind sparrow (Passer pyrrhonotus), also known as the Sind jungle sparrow, jungle sparrow, or rufous-backed sparrow, is a passerine bird of the Passeridae sparrow family. It lives around the Indus valley region of Pakistan and parts of the Republic of India.Avibase - the world bird database Within its Indus valley breeding range in Pakistan and western India, the Sind sparrow lives in wetland habitats with thorny scrub and tall grass. ==References== Category:Birds of Pakistan Category:Passeri Category:Birds of India
title: Sind sparrow
